info.name: Simple White X grayish
info.description: This style changes the theme Simple White X for Firefox. It makes the toolbars have a light gray background similar to the background in Firefox's default theme. It darkens the frame area (with the section tabs) of the Options and the Add-ons Manager pages. It also darkens the background of the panels from the buttons in the toolbar, e.g., the menu. (Updated for 2.2b18.x1.09.)
